sentences.sContent: You’ll never guess who I met in town.
sentences.sCn: 你绝对猜不出我在镇上碰到谁了。

sentences.sContent: I was worried I might meet Henry on the bus.
sentences.sCn: 我担心可能会在公共汽车上遇到亨利。
